info.author: MaxiL
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: Python Software Foundation License
Topic :: Software Development :: Libraries :: Python Modules
info.description:
pure python table, operations find, filter, sort, group, top, tail...

::

    theTable = SSTable()
    theTable.addIndex( "c_1", 'idx1' );
    vCol = [ "c_1", "c_2" ]
    theTable.addIndex( vCol, 'idx2' );
    theTable.addRow( dict( c_1 = 1, c_2 = 2 ) )
    theTable.addRow( dict( c_1 = 1, c_2 = 2 ) )
    theTable.addRow( dict( c_1 = 2, c_2 = 3 ) )

    #search by index
    rs = theTable.findRow( "idx2", ( 1, 2 ) )
    pprint( rs.top( 1 ).to_list() )
    grs = rs.group( ("c_1") )

2014/06/03
	Fix bug: Coouldn't find anything after removeRow
info.name: ltable
info.summary: lite table, not depden on numpy or sqliteoperations,.. find, filter, group, sort, top, tail ..
info.html_description:
pure python table, operations find, filter, sort, group, top, tail…

theTable = SSTable()
theTable.addIndex( "c_1", 'idx1' );
vCol = [ "c_1", "c_2" ]
theTable.addIndex( vCol, 'idx2' );
theTable.addRow( dict( c_1 = 1, c_2 = 2 ) )
theTable.addRow( dict( c_1 = 1, c_2 = 2 ) )
theTable.addRow( dict( c_1 = 2, c_2 = 3 ) )

#search by index
rs = theTable.findRow( "idx2", ( 1, 2 ) )
pprint( rs.top( 1 ).to_list() )
grs = rs.group( ("c_1") )
2014/06/03
Fix bug: Coouldn’t find anything after removeRow
